sourcesContent:
<template>
  <biz-form
    :isEdit="true"
    @use-shop="onUseShop"
    :initInfo="info$"
    @rest-use-shop="onRestUseShop"
    @submit-form="onSubmit"
  >
    <template slot="range">
      <st-form-item label="总节数" labelWidth="118px" required>
        <a-radio-group
          disabled
          v-model="isLimit"
          :options="isLimitOptions$"
        ></a-radio-group>
      </st-form-item>
    </template>
    <template v-slot:courseRange="decorators">
      <add-course-range-table
        v-if="isRestCourseRange"
        :decorators="decorators.decorators"
        :useShopInfo="useShopInfo"
        :initInfo="info$"
        :isLimit="isLimit"
        @change="onCourseRange"
      ></add-course-range-table>
    </template>
  </biz-form>
</template>

<script>
import BizForm from './component#/form'
import AddCourseRangeTable from './component#/add-course-range-table'
import { EditRangePackageService } from './edit-range-package.service'
export default {
  name: 'EditFixPackage',
  components: {
    BizForm,
    AddCourseRangeTable
  },
  serviceInject() {
    return {
      service: EditRangePackageService
    }
  },
  rxState() {
    const { info$, isLimitOptions$ } = this.service
    return {
      info$,
      isLimitOptions$
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      isLimit: 1,
      reserveIsLimitInfo: {},
      useShopInfo: {},
      isRestCourseRange: true
    }
  },
  methods: {
    onRestUseShop() {
      this.isRestCourseRange = false
      let timer = setTimeout(() => {
        this.isRestCourseRange = true
        clearTimeout(timer)
      })
    },
    onUseShop(useShopInfo) {
      this.useShopInfo = useShopInfo
    },
    onCourseRange(rangeCourse) {
      this.rangeCourse = { ...rangeCourse }
    },
    onSubmit(form) {
      this.service
        .edit({
          id: this.info$.package_course_id,
          is_limit: this.isLimit,
          ...this.rangeCourse,
          ...form
        })
        .subscribe(res => {
          this.$router.push({
            name: 'brand-product-package-list'
          })
        })
    }
  },
  created() {
    this.reserveIsLimitInfo = {
      reserve_is_limit: this.info$.reserve_is_limit,
      reserve_limit_day: this.info$.reserve_limit_day,
      reserve_limit_times: this.info$.reserve_limit_times
    }
    this.isLimit = this.info$.is_limit
  }
}
</script>
